page.title: 14LOWER FOLD FARM
page.content: "Higher Hurdsfield seems to have no real centre". This may be the view of those who see only a main road with houses on either side and little else, but there are items of interest.A little lane leads to Lower Fold Farm, an attractive building said to contain the oldest room in this part of Macclesfield. Until recently two of its windows were bricked up because of the old "Window Tax" laws, but these have been reopened. Here too we can see the skill of the craftsman in the handmade furniture of beautiful traditional design which has been produced by the present occupant. Old and new are blended together with great skill.Outside a small building at the top of Rainow Road a notice board says "Higher Hurdsfield Community Centre and Sunday School."It is still used as a Sunday School & W.I
